name: 5th Edition of World Nanotechnology Conference
content: Magnus Group is ecstatic to invite you to its well-established event “5th Edition of World Nanotechnology Conference” (Nanotechnology 2022)” which will be taking place at Paris, France and virtually during September 21-22, 2022\. The Nanotechnology congress will be held around the theme “NANO: Neoteric Advancements that Navigate and Outline the next generations.” This global nano summit will begin by establishing a global platform where passionate researchers, scientists, academicians, educators, nanotechnologists, policymakers, stakeholders, and intellectual scholars will come together for the common goal of identifying challenges and issues in Nanomaterials and Nanotechnology, as well as sustainable methods to address those issues based on their combined research findings. This worldwide nanotechnology congress will give you with a fabulous opportunity to learn more about the latest multidisciplinary approaches in nanoscience and nanotechnology. Furthermore, by offering significant networking time for you to meet top individuals in the area, the conference provides a vital platform for you to make new contacts in the field of nanoscience and nanotechnology. We hope you will find this nanotechnology Conference useful, informative, and enjoyable.
